name: Alchemist Dungeon Demo
description:
This is the demo for game - Alchemist Dungeon

Game plot:

The young alchemist girl Annelle, on the orders of the Dark Amethyst guild, sets off in search of a philosopher's stone. The rumors about riches in abandoned alchemists' dungeon, indicated its location. Having reached the dungeon and going into it, Annelle was locked inside...

Key Features:
  • Explore fully randomly generated dungeon (no pre-drawn patterns at all)
  • Combine 4 ingredients in any way to create 60+ helpful potions (10 potions available in demo)
  • Upgrade 20+ magical runes with 9 gems as you need (10 runes available in demo)
  • Unique gas mechanics involving gas physics
  • Experience true pixel art in 320x180 resolution
  • Game supports 3 types of controls: gamepad, keyboard + mouse and keyboard only
